alert.note: Alert for Monroe (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 8:42PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Giles and southwestern Monroe Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 842 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Thessalia, or near Narrows, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pearisburg... Narrows... Pembroke... Peterstown... Mountain Lake... Poplar Hill... and Rich Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
